info.description:
About
------------------------------------------------------

Kapri is a fork of the infamous "genkernel", which is used
commonly by Gentoo during the installation process to ease 
the process of kernel configuration and installation.
info.name: Kapri
info.summary: A fork of the infamous genkernel
info.html_description: Kapri is a fork of the infamous “genkernel”, which is used commonly by Gentoo during the installation process to ease the process of kernel configuration and installation.
